and I wanted to match somehow the exuberance of the music and at the same time expressed the freedom of

The props are always the most difficult thing because the budget usually only allows one access to BBC prop Department, which is vast and is very extensive and contains an enormous amount of old junk. As I was when I first came to television The Voice used to be almost as loud as the symphony orchestra and so one could never achieve any sort of dramatic effect.
